content: Spin - DEX for decentralized crypto futures and options tradingSpin ico presale details : https://icogems.com/ico/SpinIntroducing Spin - the revolutionary multichain DEX designed to enhance decentralized crypto futures and options trading. Our platform redefines efficiency by empowering traders with cutting-edge risk management tools and advanced strategy-building capabilities. Leveraging a superior Central Limit Order Book order execution model, Spin delivers a seamless trading experience.Our primary mission is to enable users to access derivatives such as futures and options on a decentralized exchange boasting an order book enriched with exclusive risk management features. Beyond catering to experienced traders, we are committed to nurturing newcomers, welcoming them into our platform through a user-friendly, accessible UI/UX. Our aim is to introduce everyone to the boundless potential of financial derivatives on the decentralized infrastructure of blockchain.
